addVar.desc: Choose the name and namespace of the Variable you want to add.
addVar.title: Add Variable

dialog.createTooltip: Hold {{modifier}} to add an additional Variable.

overwrite.title: Import Variable

label.noVariableSelected: Select a Variable to edit its properties.

message.variablePresent: This Variable is already present in a required project. Do you want to import it?
